title: Quarterly traffic estimates (TRA25)
description: Provisional data on road traffic by vehicle type and road class, produced by Department for Transport.
datasetNotes: On the landing page there are  6 ODS spreadsheets
sizingNotes: Simple table structure with footnotes. Although there are 6 ODS spreadsheets it may be possible to reduced this by combining Miles & KM data sets
notes: Q1 2020 makes reference to the Covid-19 Pandemic.  Although there are 6 ODS spreadsheets it  may be possible to combine the data sets for Miles & KM for each data set.
